Module assegnamento2.assegnamento2
Package assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller

Class EmployeeController

java.lang.Object
assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.Controller
assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.EmployeeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminController
public class EmployeeController extends Controller implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The class EmployeeController represent the controller where we can control all the buttons and functionality of the Employee fxml file. This class inherit from Controller class.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is used initialize a controller after its root element has been fully processed.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - It is the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object or null if the location is unknown.
      resourceBundle - It is the resources used to locate the root object or null if the root object has not been located.

    • setEmployee

      public void setEmployee(Employee emp)
      This method is used to set the Employee's object.
      Parameters:
      emp - is the Employee's object.

    • handleViewBuyElDev

      public void handleViewBuyElDev()
      This method is used to print the list of products that have run out of stock in the graphical interface.

    • handleChoiceClient

      public void handleChoiceClient()
      This method is used to print in the combobox choiceClient the list of clients who have made at least one order.

    • readOrder

      public void readOrder() throws ParserConfigurationException, IOException, SAXException
      This method is used to read orders that are present in the DB_Order.XML file and after reading a whole order from a single client it adds it to the clientList support list.
      Throws:
      ParserConfigurationException - Indicates a serious configuration error.
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
      SAXException - Encapsulate a general SAX error or warning.

    • readUsername

      public void readUsername() throws ParserConfigurationException, IOException, SAXException
      This method is used in order to clean the combobox and immediately after to add all the usernames of the various clients that have carried out an order.
      Throws:
      ParserConfigurationException - Indicates a serious configuration error.
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
      SAXException - Encapsulate a general SAX error or warning.

    • handleSendAll

      public void handleSendAll() throws ParserConfigurationException, IOException, SAXException, XMLStreamException
      This method is used by the "Send All" button to confirm the order of a single client and subsequently update the various lists and tableviews.
      Throws:
      ParserConfigurationException - Indicates a serious configuration error.
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
      SAXException - Encapsulate a general SAX error or warning.
      XMLStreamException - is used to report well-formedness errors as well as unexpected processing conditions.

    • writeOrder

      public void writeOrder() throws XMLStreamException, IOException
      This method is used in order to go to write on the DB_Order.XML file the various orders of the clients using like support the method getShop() of the Client class.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
      XMLStreamException - is used to report well-formedness errors as well as unexpected processing conditions.

    • handleUpdate

      public void handleUpdate() throws XMLStreamException, FileNotFoundException
      This method is used by the update buttons found in Admin.fxml and Employee.fxml to update the quantity of the selected product.
      Throws:
      XMLStreamException - is used to report well-formedness errors as well as unexpected processing conditions.
      FileNotFoundException - reports that an attempt to open the file indicated by a specified path name has failed.

    • updateSwitch

      public void updateSwitch(int result) throws XMLStreamException, FileNotFoundException
      This method is used by update buttons, and it's formed mainly by a switch that according to the result of the parameter appears a different alert.
      Parameters:
      result - is an integer that handles integers:
      0: external method executed successfully, the product is updated;
      1: error, an invalid value has been inserted for the Amount field;
      2: error, you have not inserted an integer;
      3: error, product not present.
      Throws:
      XMLStreamException - is used to report well-formedness errors as well as unexpected processing conditions.
      FileNotFoundException - reports that an attempt to open the file indicated by a specified path name has failed.
